Caption: Mr. C. R. Muthukrishnan, B. Tech. (Electrical), gold medallist receives the President's Prize for the year 1965, from the Chief Guest, Union Minister for Education Mr. M. C. Chagla
Description: The President's Prize consisted of a gold medallion and National Savings Certificate of the value of Rs. 150. It was awarded to the best student of the B. Tech. Degree Course. Muthukrishnan was a faculty member at IIT Madras from 1975 to 2003. He served as Dean of Academic Courses, as Deputy Director and as Director-in-Charge at IIT Madras. He went on to serve as Consulting Advisor, TCS, and was in the Tamil Nadu IT Task Force (1998-2001). He has also served as President of the Computer Society of India (2000-2002), as Indo-French Scientific Council Member (2000-2005) and as Director on the Boards of Tidel Park and Indian Bank. He is a Senior Member of ACM, IEEE and ISTE, and Fellow of CSI. He was Chief Editor of Computer Science & Informatics.
